description: This file sets up a financial analysis team with agents for market data and news research, configures telemetry and instrumentation, and initiates a sample analysis of Tesla stock.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an autonomous agent with specific roles, tools, and instructions for tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model interface for OpenAI's chat models used by agents.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: A collection of agents working together with shared instructions.

classes.name: AgnoInstrumentor
classes.description: Handles instrumentation and telemetry setup for the application.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the team analysis, optionally streaming the output.
